src/65c02/jam/rom/wozmon.s

WozMon was taken from the Apple I
Copyright 1976 by Apple Computer, Inc.

It was modified to reflect the different I/O of the Sorbus JAM.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

src/65c02/jam/mon/assembler.s
src/65c02/jam/mon/disassembler.s

The (dis-)assembly routines for the 65c02 system monitor were taken from:

Apple //c Monitor ROM Source
Copyright 1977-1983 by Apple Computer, Inc.
All Rights Reserved

(Almost everyone used that code "back in the days", but just didn't tell.)

It was slightly modified to simplify usage and complete 65SC02 opcode set.
